game.name: Dinosaur Hunter Survival
game.description:
It is good to see the dangerous dinosaurs in books and movies. But, meeting them in the real life cannot more than just a bad dream. Today you have entered a huge Jurassic rainforest where multiple dinosaurs are walking and enjoying their lives. Your job in this brand new and fast-paced action game is to kill all of them and make this place free from these deadly creatures. Grab your gun and roll your sleeves up to experience the best dinosaur hunting of your life in Dinosaur Hunter Survival!

Be careful as these blood-thirsty creatures are walking around the rainforest! You need to be alert all the time to keep you alive and become the winner in each level. Keep your eyes on your power bar as well and make sure that you achieve your dinosaur hunting objectives as a brave huntsman! These ruthless bloodthirsty animals will start chasing you as you release the first bullet from your gun. Try to keep shooting your target dinosaur until they will fall down the ground!

This is a faraway exotic forest and desert where no one is present except you and the dangerous dinosaurs. Put your sniper and shooting abilities to test to clear all the missions and become the winner! This latest cool 3D shooter game features exclusive thrill, fun, entertainment and wilderness in beautiful but wild environments. There are different types of dinosaurs to kill in this one of the best dinosaur hunting games for boys and girls. Hold your breath while shooting to aim your target precisely through all the levels!
